about.heroDesc: Your journey toward recovery begins here… where pain turns into hope, and treatment becomes a fully integrated human experience that brings together science, precision, and care.
about.heroImageAlt: Rehabilitation session with therapist and patient
about.whoWeAreText: AL Motahadi Medical Rehabilitation Center is dedicated to providing exceptional rehabilitation care that goes beyond just treatment. Our focus is on restoring a patient's movement, confidence, and quality of life through personalized and evidence-based therapy. As a leading center in physical therapy and medical rehabilitation, we operate with the highest medical standards, using the latest global treatment protocols. We stand out as the founders of an international research network that spans over 100 centers in 19 countries, allowing us to continuously update our treatment plans based on the most current scientific advancements. We offer flexible treatment options tailored to each patient's needs, whether at our center or at home, with a dedicated transportation service to ensure continuous care. Our sessions are personalized and focused on individual treatment plans rather than fixed time durations, making the patient experience more effective and impactful. At AL Motahadi, we prioritize the human aspect of rehabilitation, placing the patient's comfort and needs at the core of every step of their therapeutic journey.
about.ourVisionText: To be a leading and reference center in the Sultanate of Oman and the region in the field of medical rehabilitation and physical therapy, by delivering therapeutic and research services of global quality and transforming the rehabilitation journey into a true story of life restoration.
about.ourMissionText: To provide comprehensive medical rehabilitation services based on advanced scientific treatment protocols, while respecting privacy, personalizing treatment for each patient, and strengthening mutual trust between the patient and the medical team.
about.humanFirstDesc: We place the patient at the center of every decision and step.
about.scientificExcellenceDesc: We innovate and lead through the latest global research-based protocols.
about.transparencyTrustDesc: We build our relationship with patients and the community on honesty and clarity.
about.professionalConfidentialityDesc: We adhere to the highest standards of patient data protection and privacy.
about.innovationDesc: We integrate science, experience, and technology to make a real difference.
about.responsibilityDesc: Serving the community is a core and firmly rooted part of our identity.
about.ourStoryHeading: AL Motahadi Center: From Idea to Opening
about.ourStoryText: The concept of AL Motahadi Medical Rehabilitation Center originated from a visionary goal to transform the rehabilitation sector in Oman by introducing a model that blends scientific excellence, human compassion, and community service. The center aimed to bring a fundamental change to the delivery of rehabilitation services, keeping pace with global advancements and focusing on the human aspect of therapy. The trial phase of the center began on September 1, 2024, with the training of medical and administrative teams, development of patient reception systems, and establishment of a culture of professional ethics. The official opening occurred on February 15, 2025, under the patronage of Her Highness Sayyida Hajija bint Jaifer Al Said, attended by dignitaries and health professionals. Since its opening, AL Motahadi has become a leading institution in medical rehabilitation in Oman, committed to maintaining high-quality standards and continuously evolving its treatment protocols through research and evaluation.
about.ourStoryImageAlt: AL Motahadi Center official opening ceremony — ribbon-cutting with dignitaries
about.founderDesc1: Behind the establishment of AL Motahadi Medical Rehabilitation Center stands Dr. Mohammed Reda bin Naji Al-Yazidi, a specialist in physical therapy and medical rehabilitation, and a pioneer in developing modern therapeutic models. He did not only establish the center, but also founded the international research network that is today considered one of the most prominent sources of advanced treatment protocols adopted by the center.
about.founderDesc2: His personal experience as a person with a disability shaped within him a deep human sensitivity and a unique understanding of patient needs; for him, care is not a service... but a human commitment.
about.founderDesc3: His journey combines clinical practice, scientific research, and academic influence, making AL Motahadi Center a landmark that embodies excellence in both knowledge and spirit.
about.founderImageAlt: Dr. Mohammed Reda bin Naji Al-Yazidi — Founder, AL Motahadi Medical Rehabilitation Center
about.medicalTeamDesc1: AL Motahadi Center includes an elite group of highly experienced specialists in physical therapy and rehabilitation, working according to the MDT (Multidisciplinary Team) model, which enables the development of a comprehensive and integrated treatment plan tailored to each case and regularly reviewed based on actual progress indicators.
about.medicalTeamDesc2: Our team's role is not limited to delivering treatment alone; they actively participate in scientific research conducted by the international research network, making them contributors to the creation of medical knowledge—not merely implementers of it.
about.medicalTeamDesc3: They are not just a therapeutic team... but partners in creating impact.
about.medicalTeamImageAlt: AL Motahadi medical team — healthcare professionals
about.socialResponsibilityText1: At AL Motahadi Center, we believe that our mission goes beyond treatment to include serving the community. Through the Ehata program, directed toward those most in need of rehabilitation services, we contribute to supporting low-income patients, the elderly, women and persons with disabilities through the Hope, Charity, Care, and Step packages.
about.socialResponsibilityText2: We also offer special discounts for retirees and employees of the Royal Oman Police, and organize educational workshops and awareness courses in partnership with government and private institutions to promote rehabilitation culture and quality of life.

contact.heroDesc: Start your treatment journey with us through the online booking form or contact us directly via WhatsApp.
contact.bookViaFormDesc: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you shortly
contact.placeholderMessage: Tell us about your condition or any specific requirements
contact.bookViaWhatsAppDesc: Prefer a quick chat? Reach us directly on WhatsApp
contact.whatsappExtra: Connect with our team instantly through WhatsApp for quick responses and easy appointment scheduling.
contact.successMessage: Thank you! Your appointment request has been submitted.
contact.errorSend: Failed to send. Please try again or contact us via WhatsApp.

servicesPage.heroDesc1: At AL Motahadi Medical Rehabilitation Center, we do not offer ordinary therapy solutions… we design a fully integrated treatment journey for each case.
servicesPage.heroDesc2: Here, treatment is not a general protocol applied to everyone, but a precise plan tailored specifically for each patient, based on a comprehensive assessment and implemented using the latest technologies and advanced rehabilitation methods—by a specialist that places the human being at the heart of every therapeutic decision.
servicesPage.s1Desc: Scientific precision for pain relief, mobility, and strength with non-surgical approaches to various conditions.
servicesPage.s2Desc: Injury recovery, functional movement, and post-surgical care to return you to peak performance.
servicesPage.s3Desc: Improving functional capacity for patients with heart and lung conditions.
servicesPage.s4Desc: Improving balance, reducing dizziness, and preventing falls with personalized programs.
servicesPage.s5Desc: Maintaining independence for the elderly; addressing Parkinson's, Alzheimer's, and balance conditions.
servicesPage.s6Desc: High-precision, long-term care for stroke, MS, Parkinson's, and other neurological conditions to improve quality of life.
servicesPage.s7Desc: Integrated therapy and pelvic health with high standards of care for women.
servicesPage.s8Desc: Integrated rehabilitation for cancer treatment, managing side effects and emotional support.
servicesPage.s9Desc: Reducing swelling, improving fluid drainage, and post-surgical care.
servicesPage.s10Desc: Tailored programs for weight loss, metabolism, and fitness.
servicesPage.s11Desc: Addressing speech and voice disorders for children and adults.
servicesPage.s12Desc: Personalized recovery, mobility, and support after hospital stays.

team.heroDesc: At AL Motahadi Medical Rehabilitation Center, our medical team is comprised of highly trained, compassionate professionals dedicated to providing personalized rehabilitation care. Each member brings specialized expertise in physical therapy, medical rehabilitation, and holistic recovery approaches. Together, we work collaboratively to create individualized treatment plans that address the physical, functional, and quality-of-life needs of every patient.
team.heroSubdesc: Our multidisciplinary approach ensures comprehensive support throughout the recovery journey, fostering an environment of trust, empathy, and evidence-based practice.
team.modelDesc: The heart of our work lies in the belief that comprehensive rehabilitation care starts with a well-rounded team. We bring together physical therapy consultants, rehabilitation specialists, and allied health professionals to ensure every patient receives holistic, evidence-based treatment. This collaborative model allows us to address all facets of recovery—physical, functional, and quality of life—creating a robust foundation for long-term success.
team.seamlessCareDesc: From initial assessment to discharge, we coordinate every step of your rehabilitation journey for a smooth, integrated experience.
team.patientCommunicationDesc: We view the patient as a partner in treatment, keeping you informed and involved in every decision.
team.holisticApproachDesc: We address the whole person—physical, functional, and quality of life—not just the condition.
team.continuousDevelopmentDesc: Our team stays at the forefront of rehabilitation science through ongoing training and the international research network.
team.qualityProfessionalismDesc: We adhere to the highest medical standards and evidence-based protocols in every intervention.
team.collaborativeTeamworkDesc: Specialists work together to design and review your plan, ensuring the best outcome for your case.
team.philosophyDesc1: Our team operates on the principle that recovery is not a solitary endeavor. By combining medical expertise with genuine human connection, we create a therapeutic alliance that empowers patients to take ownership of their healing process. We believe in treating the whole person—not just the addiction—and ensuring that dignity, respect, and hope guide every interaction. Through collaboration, transparency, and ongoing support, we help individuals rediscover their strengths and build sustainable pathways to wellness.
team.philosophyDesc2: If you or a loved one is seeking expert, compassionate care from a team that truly understands the complexities of addiction and mental health, we invite you to reach out. Together, we can create a plan that honors your unique story and sets you on a path toward lasting recovery.
team.drMohammed: Dr. Mohammed Reda bin Naji Al-Yazidi

packages.heroDesc: Our therapeutic packages at AL Motahadi Medical Rehabilitation Center are not "offers"… they are carefully designed rehabilitation plans built on precise evaluation, providing you with an integrated treatment program that suits your condition, needs, and health goals. We do not offer sessions measured in minutes, but rather progressive therapeutic improvement supervised by a specialized team, with the option to integrate home therapy or transportation services when needed and according to your preference.
packages.heroDescSecondary: If you are unsure which package is right for you, you may book an initial consultation session so the team can recommend the most suitable option for your case.
packages.khatwaSessions: For Persons with Disabilities. Fixed 40% discount on the number of sessions determined by the initial evaluation.
packages.alAmalSessions: For Low-income Individuals. Discount of up to 70%, subject to social assessment and supporting documents.

whoWeAre.heroDesc1: AL Motahadi Medical Rehabilitation Center is dedicated to providing exceptional rehabilitation care that goes beyond treatment. We focus on restoring movement, confidence, and quality of life through personalized, evidence-based therapy.
whoWeAre.heroDesc2: As a leading center in physical therapy and medical rehabilitation, we operate to the highest medical standards and use the latest global treatment protocols, with a commitment to placing the patient at the heart of every step.
whoWeAre.heroImageAlt: Therapist assisting patient in a calm rehabilitation environment
whoWeAre.protocolsDesc1: We are the only center in the Sultanate of Oman that bases its treatment plans on exclusive and proprietary therapeutic protocols issued by an international research network that we ourselves established, comprising more than 100 rehabilitation centers across 19 countries worldwide.
whoWeAre.protocolsDesc2: Through this network, our patients gain access to the latest advancements in rehabilitation science—without ever leaving the Sultanate.
whoWeAre.planSubtitle: At AL Motahadi Center... we do not measure session time; we measure outcomes.
whoWeAre.planDesc: Our therapy sessions are not a race against the clock, but a structured path toward achieving clear and measurable goals for each patient, based on a precisely designed individualized treatment plan tailored to their unique needs.
whoWeAre.teamSubtitle: Meet Our Experts, Your Health Advocates
whoWeAre.teamDesc1: AL Motahadi Center brings together an experienced team of specialists in physical therapy and rehabilitation. We work using a multidisciplinary approach to develop comprehensive, integrated treatment plans for each patient.
whoWeAre.teamDesc2: Our team does not only deliver treatment—they contribute to research and the continuous improvement of care, placing your recovery and comfort at the center of everything we do.
whoWeAre.teamImageAlt: AL Motahadi medical team — healthcare professionals
whoWeAre.homeTherapySubtitle: Because we believe that treatment should reach the patient—not the other way around...
whoWeAre.homeTherapyDesc1: We offer home therapy services that ensure the same level of care, precision, and professionalism provided at the center, delivered in a comfortable and private environment for the patient.
whoWeAre.transportSubtitle: Because logistical challenges should never be a reason to delay treatment...
whoWeAre.transportDesc1: We provide a safe and comfortable transportation service specifically designed for patients who face difficulty accessing the center. Our goal is to remove barriers—not create them.
whoWeAre.specializationsSubtitle: Tailored Care for Your Unique Health Needs
whoWeAre.specializationsDesc: AL Motahadi Center combines specialized expertise in physical therapy, neurological rehabilitation, pain management, and post-surgical recovery, supported by our international research network and a human-centered approach to every patient journey.
